name: Wait For Me (Lychees)
description:
A simple endless runner made as a class project on a team over a couple months. It has 3 different levels which you can unlock by playing, and an online leaderboard! Hope you enjoy!

Controls:
Lclick: Jump, hold to hover

Rclick: Fast-fall in midair, hold to slide under obstacles

Credits:
Me! Programming, Level design, sfx

Dylan M - Producer, Level art

Joshua T - Playtest, Documentation

Justin R - Player concept, animated art

Nathaniel A - Programming, Level design

Daniel M - Music
